title: Apple Watch Ultra - Depth App & Action Button
summary: Configuring the Action Button for diving and workouts.
content:
Action Button Setup: Go to Settings > Action Button. Can be set to: Workout, Stopwatch, Waypoint, Backtrack, Dive, Flashlight. 

Depth App Auto-Launch: To prevent the depth app from opening when washing hands, go to Settings > General > Auto-Launch > turn off 'Auto-Launch App'.
